name: Veleeho
description:
If you are playing the web version of the game use fullscreen mode or it will not scale right! Multiplayer does not work on chromebooks!
About:
Veleeho is a short online multiplayer experience where you control a wizard and kill goblins. You can either play it by yourself or with a friend.


Controls:
Arrow keys or wasd to move 
Z to interact with interactive things 
X to shoot (MB1 if mouse shooting is on) 
C to lock the player 
Esc or E to go to pause menu 

Hope you like it!
